'''Brush of a Thousand Winds''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoints]] in [[Mondstadt]] (excludes the [[Dragonspine]] area).
